function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation due to fixed windows and limited airflow control","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases such as flu or COVID-19","Mitigation":"Install adjustable ventilation systems and air purifiers to improve air quality and reduce the risk of disease transmission","Technologies":"Adjustable ventilation systems, air purifiers, and UV-C germicidal lamps","People":"Gym members, fitness instructors, and staff","Owner":"Health club management"},{"Description":"Ineffective occupancy management and monitoring","Impact":"Higher chance of overcrowding and difficulty in maintaining physical distancing, leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement a real-time occupancy monitoring system through the mobile application and use image recognition for accurate tracking of member movements","Technologies":"Real-time occupancy monitoring system, image recognition technology, and mobile application","People":"Gym members, fitness instructors, and staff","Owner":"Health club management"},{"Description":"Risk of surface transmission due to shared equipment and facilities","Impact":"Potential for contamination and spread of infectious diseases through shared gym equipment and facilities","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of equipment and implementation of touchless access systems to reduce physical contact with surfaces","Technologies":"Touchless access systems, UV-C disinfection, and antimicrobial coatings","People":"Gym members, fitness instructors, and staff","Owner":"Health club management"}]}
